title: Litsea (May Chang) Essential Oil
description: Botanical name May Chang/Farmed/China Steam distilled from the fruits. Has a pleasant, fruity Lemon scent, kind of intense and sweeter than Lemongrass. It is prized in perfume blending. In traditional Chinese medicine it is known to be used with dysmenorrhea, indigestion, lower back pain, chills, headaches, muscular ac
